Class Notepad

  • java.lang.Object
    • Notepad
  • public class Notepad
extends java.lang.Object
    NotePad class. Need for organize and manage note in Notepad.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tikhomirov Viktor
    See Also:
    For creating instance of Note use NoteInNotepad class.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<NoteInNotepad> notesArray
      Notes keep in Notepad at ArrayList.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Notepad()
      Create instance of Notepad without notes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int addNote​(java.lang.String note)
      Method addNote is required to add a Note in NotePad
      boolean deleteNote​(int index)
      Method deleteNote is required to remove note from notepad.
      boolean editNote​(int index, java.lang.String newNote)
      Method editNote is required to editing note in notepad.
      void seeAllNotes()
      Method seeAllNotes is required to print all notes contained in Notepad.

      • notesArray

        private java.util.ArrayList<NoteInNotepad> notesArray
        Notes keep in Notepad at ArrayList. notesArray contains instances of NoteInNotepad.

        NoteInNotepad class

    • Constructor Detail

      • Notepad

        public Notepad()
        Create instance of Notepad without notes.

    • Method Detail

      • addNote

        public int addNote​(java.lang.String note)
        Method addNote is required to add a Note in NotePad
        Parameters:
        note - it is String with note data.
        Returns:
        index of note element in Array, which method created.

      • deleteNote

        public boolean deleteNote​(int index)
        Method deleteNote is required to remove note from notepad.
        Parameters:
        index - index of anote wich we will need to remove.
        Returns:
        true, if element contained in notepad; false, if index incorrect.

      • editNote

        public boolean editNote​(int index,
                        java.lang.String newNote)
        Method editNote is required to editing note in notepad.
        Parameters:
        index - index of an edited note.
        newNote - new data that will be contained in the note.
        Returns:
        true, if element containing in notepad; false, if index incorrect.

      • seeAllNotes

        public void seeAllNotes()
        Method seeAllNotes is required to print all notes contained in Notepad.
